response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item has been meticulously crafted and holds significant value to us, reflecting its worth of $15,000. Considering its true worth, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. We hope this aligns with your expectations and budget.
